title: InStem Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 02 Project Associate- I/II Posts
description: The Institute of Stem Cell Biology and Regenerative Medicine (InStem) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02 Project Associate-I/II Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech and Post-graduation students can apply for the InStem Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the educ...
